description:
GroupDocs.Comparison for .NET is a flexible library that allows end users to compare two versions of a document side-by-side from within your web and mobile applications. It merges two documents into a single one and displays it, highlighting differences with the redline diff view approach - similar to the Microsoft Word change tracking feature, but online.
Supported file formats include: PDF, Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Visio, Project, Outlook, OpenDocument, AutoCAD, TIFF, PNG, JPEG, GIF, BMP and many more (over 45 document and image file formats).
Note: this download contains a fully working version of the product, however without a license set it will run in evaluation mode with some limitations. To test GroupDocs.Annotation for .NET Library without limitations, request a free 30-day temporary license.
releaseNotes:
- Console application support without any UI
- Support comparison from streams
- Improved PDF comparsions

title: GroupDocs.Comparison for .NET
